alert.note: Alert for Butler; Harvey; Sedgwick; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 9:33PM CST until February 26 at 10:30PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sedgwick County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Harvey County in south central Kansas... Western Butler County in south central Kansas... Northeastern Sumner County in south central Kansas... * Until 1030 PM CST. * At 933 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Clearwater, moving northeast at 45 mph. 70mph gust were recently reported 7 miles south of Goddard Kansas. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Augusta, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Mulvane, Goddard, Rose Hill, Maize, Clearwater, Douglass, Sedgwick, Towanda, Colwich, Benton, Whitewater and Downtown Wichita. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 29. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 33 and 65. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
